name: Formulator Sample Shop - FSS Ceramide Complex
description: Formulator Sample Shop offers FSS Ceramide Complex, a concentrated mix of different ceramides, cholesterol, free fatty acids, and phytosphingosine. This complete barrier repair system is ideal for personal care products, providing comprehensive lipid support in small quantities suitable for R&D and small-batch production.
notes: FSS brand ensures tested and quality-controlled ingredients. Concentrated mix includes multiple ceramide types plus cholesterol, free fatty acids, and phytosphingosine. Ideal for formulators needing small quantities for testing and development.
description: Formulator Sample Shop (FSS) is a small-scale cosmetic ingredients supplier offering FSS Ceramide Complex, a concentrated mix of different ceramides, cholesterol, free fatty acids, and phytosphingosine. This complete barrier repair system is ideal for personal care products targeting barrier repair and moisturizing applications with low MOQ for formulators.
products: FSS Ceramide Complex (Ceramides, cholesterol, free fatty acids, phytosphingosine)
notes: Small-scale cosmetic ingredients supplier focused on formulators and product developers. FSS Ceramide Complex is a concentrated mix combining different ceramide types, cholesterol, free fatty acids, and phytosphingosine for complete barrier repair. Ideal for small-scale formulators and product developers with very low MOQ and sample sizes available. Complete system simplifies barrier repair formulation development.
